comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180912
usage: "OCR_xxx": "xywh": "10;30;50;25" # x;y;width;height of bounding box of OCR_xxx
"OCR_xxx": "prefix": "TI" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx": "suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx": "type": "float" # after stripping prefix and suffix, text should be converted to this data type
If "OCR_probeID" is specified, OCR will be used to find an identifier for values, info from the dicom headers is used

params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
params.ocr_border: add extra border around text in ROI before ocr analysis (10)

OCR_DynRange.prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_DynRange starts with this
OCR_DynRange.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_DynRange should be of this type
OCR_DynRange.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_DynRange

OCR_FrameRate.suffix: text in bounding box of OCR_FrameRate starts with this
OCR_FrameRate.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_FrameRate should be of this type
OCR_FrameRate.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_FrameRate

OCR_Gain.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_Gain should be of this type
OCR_Gain.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_Gain

OCR_LUT.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_LUT should be of this type
OCR_LUT.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_LUT

OCR_MechIndex.prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_MechIndex starts with this
OCR_MechIndex.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_MechIndex should be of this type
OCR_MechIndex.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_MechIndex

OCR_PenResGen.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_PenResGen should be of this type
OCR_PenResGen.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_PenResGen

OCR_Persistence.prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_Persistence starts with this
OCR_Persistence.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_Persistence should be of this type
OCR_Persistence.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_Persistence

OCR_ResSpd.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_ResSpd should be of this type
OCR_ResSpd.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_ResSpd

OCR_TissueIndex.prefix: text in bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex starts with this
OCR_TissueIndex.type: contents minus prefix of bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex should be of this type
OCR_TissueIndex.xywh: x0;y0;width;height of bounding box of OCR_TissueIndex

params.ocr_threshold: threshold on pixel values to remove background gradient (0)

params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
params.cluster_mode: mode of connected components analysis; either all_middle (def) or largest_only
params.fitcircle_frac: use only this central fraction for circle fitting
params.hor_offset: default lines to exclude from left and right when making profiles (10)
params.rev_bbox: restrict reverberation pattern to bounding box xmin;xmax;ymin;ymax in px
params.sen_delta: a peak in sensitivity profile must be at least <fdelta>*(max-noise)
params.sen_filter: running average of this width for sensitivity data
params.signal_thresh: threshold on pixelvalues for reverberation patterns; use>0 for noisy data (0)
params.uni_delta: a dip in normalized reverb pattern must be at least <delta>
params.uni_depth: depth in mm of size of ROI for reverb pattern analysis from top of profile. (5)
params.uni_filter: running average of this width before peak detection
params.uni_range_model: method to determine y-range for uniformity profile. absolute/skip10pct/skip20pct/maxsenslimit (absolute)
params.uni_start: offset in mm to start of ROI for reverb pattern analysis from top of profile. (2)
params.ver_offset: default lines to exclude from top and bottom when making profiles (10)
